product_title: THRONMAX MDrill Dome Plus USB Microphone
short_description: Key Features Capture your audio for your Twitch channel or streaming server in high quality with the THRONMAX MDrill Dome Plus, a USB microphone that works with Mac, Windows, and Linux platforms. It will also play nicely with your PS4, should you want to interface directly with that gaming console.  For Streaming, Podcasts, and Audio 96 kHz / 24-Bit Resolution USB Mic Omnidirectional & Cardioid Polar Pattern 3.5mm Headphone Output
price: Current Price: Rs.10,999, Original Price: Rs.
description2: Capture your audio for your Twitch channel or streaming server in high quality with the THRONMAX MDrill Dome Plus, a USB microphone that works with Mac, Windows, and Linux platforms. It will also play nicely with your PS4, should you want to interface directly with that gaming console. The MDrill Dome Plus is a USB microphone designed for game streams, streaming servers, video-conferencing, YouTube videos, and more. A USB Type-C port on the mic facilitates the connection with your computer or gaming system. You can monitor in real time through the mic itself using its 3.5mm headphone output. Choose between cardioid and omnidirectional polar patterns. Use the cardioid polar pattern to minimize audio pickup behind the mic itself, or use the omnidirectional polar pattern to pick up more than one person in a video-conference. The mic allows you to capture 24-bit audio at sample rates of 96 kHz. No drivers are necessary to make the product work with your operating system; it’s all plug and play. The mic offers an integrated stand for placing it atop tables and desks.
Product: THRONMAX MDrill Dome Plus USB Microphone

product_title: Thronmax Mdrill One Pro- USB Mic Microphone KIT
short_description: Reddot Award Winner 2020  Thronmax Mdrill One Pro Black 96khz Fabric Travel Case Dust-proof Protective Sleeve Foam Windshield -Pop Filter User Guide 3 meters Type C braided cable Advanced Boom Adapter 3/8” Female- 5/8" Male Adapter
price: Current Price: Rs.17,599, Original Price: Rs.
description2: Enjoy crisp, clear recordings and experience true professional streaming performance! VERTIGAIN® technology helps to increase quality and clarity by up to 10% compared to other digital USB microphones. As sound waves move in a vertical direction, the wave reaches the 3 condensers without being scattered by any microphone mesh. Plus, with 48KHz recording, its specifically designed capsules deliver rich and highly detailed sound with 16-bit/48KHz audio recording direct to your computer. 4 Dedicated Recording Modes The MDRILL One Pro will be only mic you need! 4 different polar settings offer the ultimate flexibility. Record vocals, instruments, podcasts, interviews, conference calls, streaming and much, much more! Simply press the mode button and choose between Cardioid, Stereo, Bi-Directional or Omni-Directional patterns to find the best performance setting. So, whether you stream from home or need to record your next masterpiece, the MDRILL One Pro will help you produce studio-quality recordings – every time. Professional Recording The MDRILL One Pro features studio controls to help you professionally control every aspect of the recording process. VERTIGAIN® TECHNOLOGY
Product: Thronmax Mdrill one Pro Jet Black 96khz Creator Kit

short_description: The Thronmax P1 is a professional microphone pop filter, designed to improve audio quality for vocal applications. Made with carbon metal and nylon material, it eliminates pops more effectively than fabric filters. The curved shield design ensures dry and clean vocal tracks, while limiting external noise and reducing excessive plosives. The stainless-steel material also ensures its longevity as it prevents any spattering saliva from rusting. The Thronmax Pop Filter can be used with any microphone, simply clamp it to the microphone stand and position where desired.
price: Current Price: Rs.2,699, Original Price: Rs.
description2: Thronmax P1 – Professional advanced pop filter for vocal applications
